description: AI-driven reforms are introduced to stabilize the public advisory system, increasing the reliability of communications.
New AI capabilities enhance security protocols, allowing the Council to initiate military curfews in reaction to perceived threats.
Citizens experience disruptions as AI-driven advisories frequently interrupt traditional news, causing confusion and concern over heavy reliance on algorithms.
Military curfews are implemented in certain districts, citing AI recommendations. The move results in significant disruption of public services.
Disagreement emerges in the Council over the conflicting impacts of AI advisories and military curfews on daily life in Stenograd.
Public unrest grows as protests emerge, with citizens demanding more transparency and human oversight in AI reforms to ensure accountability and trustworthiness.
